attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This no smoking act has killed the atmosphere in nightclubs. 2/3rd's of the crowd are usually outside clubs smoking leaving very few inside, making the clubs always look empty - even now cold winter nights are here... The British nightclub is nearly dead!Save our Clubs!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
